title: 📊 PROJECT STATUS - HYBRID ANALYTICAL SYSTEM
content:
# 📊 PROJECT STATUS - HYBRID ANALYTICAL SYSTEM

**Last Updated:** 2025-11-05  
**Status:** 🟢 IMPLEMENTATION STARTED

---

## 🎯 PROJECT OVERVIEW

**Goal:** Enterprise-grade hybrid analytical system  
**Timeline:** 3 weeks to MVP  
**Team:** 10 specialized agents  
**Confidence:** HIGH

---

## ✅ PHASE COMPLETED: PLANNING & DESIGN

### What We Accomplished:

1. ✅ **Infrastructure Testing**
   - LMStudio verified (192.168.200.226:1234)
   - 2 LLM models confirmed (gpt-oss-20b, gemma-3-12b-it)
   - 2 Embedding models tested (e5-large, jina)
   - Performance benchmarked

2. ✅ **Architecture Design**
   - 4-database system justified (PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, Qdrant, Neo4j)
   - Progressive autonomy pattern designed
   - 44k context limitation strategies defined
   - Supervisor-worker model architected

3. ✅ **Team Planning**
   - Roles assigned
   - Tasks distributed
   - Timeline created
   - Success metrics defined

---

## 🚀 CURRENT PHASE: WEEK 1 - FOUNDATION

### In Progress:

**Tomasz (Developer):**
- [ ] LMStudio client implementation

**Paweł (Data Engineer):**
- [ ] PostgreSQL + pgvector setup
- [ ] Embedding pipeline

**Piotr (DevOps):**
- [ ] Infrastructure setup
- [ ] Docker compose

**Anna (QA):**
- [ ] Test framework

### Target: End of Week 1
- 10 documents processed end-to-end
- Basic multi-agent workflow
- All core components integrated

---
